Professor Plate's Notebook

Romantic Quick Kit AI Hermeneutics Kit

Archivists' Window — Catalog by Orders

The early archive filed slips by region (Dens, Quarry, Capital, etc.). This catalog adopts the Orders proposed in the South Arcade memorandum: we shelve by what reality a slip performs (boundary, doubling, craving, silence, violence, mediation), with region kept as secondary provenance.

Archivists' Debate: Read how this re-shelving came to be, from the first regional drawers to the present "Orders." History of the Debate →
Boundary Craving Doubling Mediation & Aperture Silence & Withdrawal Violence & Secret Life
Boundary Doubling Craving Silence & Withdrawal Violence & Secret Life Mediation & Aperture

Order: Boundary

Where edges won't hold; lines blur between forms (town/wilderness, road/ditch).

  • C1 — Dens: Boundary Sludge Meter Readings (west-ditch series, yrs 17–19) • Form: Survey Report • Region: Dens
  • B2 — Densmok: Two Kinds of Story about Dens • Form: Parallel Testimony • Region: Densmok

Order: Doubling

Where the world replicates, spawns journeys within journeys, originals without origin.

  • D1 — Yeller Quarry: The Hunt Silhouettes (Castelia woodcuts, provenance) • Form: Provenance File • Region: Quarry
  • D2 — Yeller Quarry: Bagbu on Roads & Doubles (minutes) • Form: Colloquy Minutes • Region: Quarry

Order: Craving

Desire as a generative force: drives, appetites, proliferations.

  • B1 — Densmok: Theorists in the Shadow (mind-node rigs catalog) • Form: Device Registry • Region: Densmok
  • G1 — Capeast: Festival Aftermath (Mapmaker's Women Arrival) • Form: Incident Report • Region: Capeast

Order: Silence & Withdrawal

Where speech collapses or is renounced; truth proceeds by quiet practice.

  • I1 — Mirado Sticks: Withdrawal Logs (return-to-body reports) • Form: Clinic Intake • Region: Sticks
  • H1 — Tower of Mirado: "Edges to Edges" (puzzle catechism) • Form: Lesson Notes • Region: Tower

Order: Violence & Secret Life

Parallel ledgers of harm and hidden motive; songs, signs, numerologies.

  • E1 — North Town: Murder Songs Index (first lines & field recordings) • Form: Song Index • Region: North Town
  • F1 — Dead River: The Counting-Five Cases (Miasto–Gunnr) • Form: Dossier • Region: Dead River

Order: Mediation & Aperture

Windows, feeds, devices, carts—the world constrained by how it's seen or carried.

  • A1 — Capital: Window Aperture, South Arcade (caliper check log) • Form: Inspection Log • Region: Capital
  • E2 — Northo/North: The Mapmaker's Pickbox (axle ledger & notes) • Form: Deposition & Ledger • Region: North
